import React from 'react' import data from '../data' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux' export default function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails=useSelector(state=>state.productDetails) const product=data.products.find(x=>x._id===props.match.params.id) return
